titles.title: A bill to extend until January 1, 1997, the previous suspension of duty on certain infant nursery intercoms and monitors.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9870)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/29/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1996, the suspension of duty on certain nursery intercoms and monitors.
